project.description: This project used to publish openeuler website

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e #GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" PROJECT_NAME="openeuler-website-v2-debug"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi cd $WORKSPACE
source $WORKSPACE/script/docs-builder.sh
echo "building backend server" cd $WORKSPACE/server docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend-debug:$IMAGE_VERSION . #docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend-debug:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend-debug:$IMAGE_VERSION
echo "building frontend server" cd $WORKSPACE/web-ui docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend-debug:$IMAGE_VERSION . #docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend-debug:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend-debug:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then #git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL #git config --global user.name $GIT_USER #git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler git config --global user.email shalldows@163.com git config --global user.name wanghao75 git clone https://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@github.com/wanghao75/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/openeuler-website-debug else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi #ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'` #curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync" if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
